question: Q1/12: You're taking the bus on your way back home. It's been a loooong day, what are you thinking about?

answers.value: I'm just so tired and can't wait to go home. Why do everyday feel the same...
Should I rest or work first when I get home? Most importantly, what's for dinner?

question: Q2/12: You look outside the windows, seems like it's going to rain soon. Suddenly everything turns into darkness!!

answers.value: I don't remember this tunnel. *Pull out your phone to look at the map*
*Turn around to see the other's reaction* Should I ask the driver what's going on?

question: Q3/12: Before you can do anything, the bus stops and everything around you floats up!

answers.value: Ok this is weird, am I dreaming? *pinch your arm*
Is this a prank? Am I getting kidnapped by aliens?!

question: Q4/12: Amidst the surprise, your eyes catch something drifting past the window.

answers.value: Woahhh...so many cats! How cute!! I wanna give them a hug!
Cats? In space? That's kinda odd... How do they survive out there?!

question: Q5/12: 'Welcome Aboard!' a small robot appears and annouces, 'We will reach our destination in 5 months 6 days and 2 hours!'

answers.value: Cool! A space cruise?! Where are we going? Do I get a spacesuit? This is so exciting!
Hey uh...Am I in space? How did I get here? When can I go home?! Why..

question: Q6/12: The robot just points to the back of the bus which now looks more like inside of a spaceship! What do you want to see first?

answers.value: Solar system themed fountain in the middle. I want to take pictures with it.
Cozy corner with a massaging chair. I need to sit down and process.

question: Q7/12: On the way back to your seat, you are surrounded by cats! 'Unauthorized passenger detected, CAPTURE CAPTURE!'

answers.value: Woah! What do you mean unauthorized? I'm the passenger of this cruise!
Ok, I have no idea what's going on. How about we calm down and chat for a bit?

question: Q8/12: Suddenly, the robot glides in, it whispers something to the cats that makes them stop.

answers.value: Bob!! Thank you! You come to save me, right?
HA! That's right! Back off, cats! Am I safe to go now?!

question: Q9/12: The robot transforms into a giant vacuum cleaner, the cats use it to point at you!

answers.value: Throw your coat at them as distraction, run towards the big green 'EXIT' sign!
Run in random direction, confuse them, blend in with the crowd!

question: Q10/12: You run past the gift shop. Looks like you got rid of them. It wouldn't hurt to get some souvenirs, right?

answers.value: Get the Jupiter headphone, wear it to hear people's thoughts!
Get the Mars watch, turn it and you can time travel!

question: Q11/12: The giant vacuum cleaner suddenly emerges in front of you! You're sucked into its vortex!!!

answers.value: It's ok, this is just a dream! I'll wake up soon! *close your eyes and give up*
I'll find the way out! Maybe there are some secret doors! *look around for the way out*

question: Q12/12: After a moment of darkness, you find yourself back in the bus. 'Are you alright?' the ticket inspector asks

answers.value: Woah! I thought I was captured... Nevermind! I'm alright now, I guess? *panic in silence*
You won't believe it...I think I just had the wildest dream ever! *tell him about your space adventure*

question: When you look up again, the inspector's already gone. You glance outside the window, darkness creeps in as the bus enters another tunnel...

answers.value: Wait...was that Bob?
Oh no...Do I have to go through this again?
